title: Patch 7.8 release date
body: Hey, do someone have any ideas of the release date of the 7.8 patch ?

replies.body:
How do people not understand at this point that every patch is every 2 weeks (unless stated otherwise by Riot directly)?
The patch has been out for 1 week, figure out how much longer you have to wait.

Everyone should get off their high horse. It's entertaining that there are people who assume the entire world revolves around the 'common knowledge' of an esport. Justifying an arrogant position with "it's been out for 8 years" is pretty laughable.

Ultima Online is a MMO that has been going since 1997, name the most popular server, the 6 main worlds, and for fun name at least one of the nine expansion packs. WHAT?! YOU DON'T KNOW? How do people not understand this at this point?
Logged in just to upvote ultima reference.
The game has been out for 8+ years now, I'm pretty sure it should be a known thing at this point.
Maybe they started recently? Must be cozy under that rock.

Guy profile shows him making topics over a year ago. I think common sense would of hit him by now. 

Must be cozy not doing basic research.

Oh this makes sense. He must have spent the last year analyzing League of Legends update trends, plotting out the dates on a spreadsheet and averaging the time spent between each update. Or at least he should have been, like everyone else who plays LoL and has "common sense".
It should be on the 19th (next Wednesday)

I was almost 90% sure that is was dropping on Wednesday, but having someone else have the same idea really helps raise my confidence in knowing that other ppl share my assumption.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

I would also like to say, not EVERY patch sits in the PBE for two weeks. Some are less like 12 days, and some are closer to 18 or 20 days. (The latter has only happened one time, but it is still possible.)

{{champion:107}} Riot i know you all hate Rengar , but did you consider stopping with the Rengar nerfs. He now feels So unreliable. You took his base Damage and Scallings, you destroyed his EMP W at least give it 0.5 sec CC immunity and he is now just a glorified spam W tank. Give him Better AD scallings .Maybe W Ad scalling heal or buffing Ad ratio on Q to reward you more for building damage and i just checked most sites and it is like 45-43 % Winrate .#Make Rengar great again!
Or you can REVERT the rework to be honest most Rengar mains like the old Rengar more. You put too much counterplay around Him that he cant even assasinate the target most of the time that is why most of the time you just jump to the tank and get the speed boost from passive . I remember in the spotlight you said "you wont jump blindly 1 vs 5 anymore " that is completly WRONG the old ult gave you vision of ALL champs in range and you coud see who is around unlike the new one.
I know what im talking about 150k points Rengar main. Please do one of these 2 things to make one of the most enjoyable champions to play actually Viable. I don't CARE about the Pro scene like 80% of the players its very sad that these champions like{{champion:268}} {{champion:107}} {{champion:13}}     get nerfed , cus they are actually one of the most enjoyable champs to play. I have an idea! Can the OP champs in the pro scene BE PERMABANNED like the URF when some champs are too strong with comunication ?
Those people that say Rengar is op GG Riot are just playing versus fed one and go alone when playing adc or mid dont listen to them getting to that point to oneshot with Rengar is REALY HARD and it happends like 10% of the games that Rengar is played.
